description: Try our easy to follow Asian-Spiced Crumbed Cutlets recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lamb chop & cutlets,High fibre,High protein,Roast,Low salt,Lamb,Low sugar,Potato
name: Asian-Spiced Crumbed Cutlets Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Line a roasting pan with baking paper.
Combine soy sauce and five-spice powder. Brush over cutlets. Lay cutlets into pan in a single layer.

Combine breadcrumbs and sesame seeds in a small bowl. Melt butter and honey together in a small pan until combined. Stir butter mixture into breadcrumbs. Top each cutlet with a little of the crumb mixture. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden.

Meanwhile, cook the potatoes in a saucepan of boiling water for 5 minutes. Add the peas and cook for a further 8 minutes or until tender. Drain. Return to pan with butter and parsley. Roughly mash. Serve cutlets with pea mash.
